text: @RepDanCrenshaw Making statements that @SpeakerPelosi had a bill to rescind travel ban for COVID-19 when the bill was for Trumps ongoing ban on Muslim counties is misleading.  Trump didn’t act quickly enough. No one opposed bans to fight CV-19. You are fake news.
